DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[view_label_data] AS SELECT dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.*, dbo.APP_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.APP_MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION AS MATERIAL_DESCRIPTION FROM dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA INNER JOIN dbo.APP_CUSTOMER ON dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = dbo.APP_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL ON dbo.APP_LABEL_DATA.MATERIAL = dbo.APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL
